sentences.en: A good salary alone is no longer enough to motivate staff.
sentences.cn: 仅仅是一份好的工资已经不足以激励员工.

sentences.en: A good teacher has to be able to motivate her students.
sentences.cn: 好教师必须能够激发学生的积极性。

sentences.en: Do those things actually motivate people at their work?
sentences.cn: 但是这些东西真能激发员工工作热情 吗 ?

sentences.en: How do you motivate people to work hard and efficiently?
sentences.cn: 你是怎样激励大家奋发高效地工作的？

sentences.en: In scores of cases they motivate the actions of the victims.
sentences.cn: 在很多案子中,这些东西还主宰着牺牲者的行动.

sentences.en: Leading by example and influencing is the driver to motivate advancement.
sentences.cn: 以身作则、发挥影响力是鼓舞我们前进的驱动力.

sentences.en: Manage and motivate the service providers to achieve the performance indicators.
sentences.cn: 管理并激励服务供应商达到各项绩效指标.

sentences.en: Motivate clubs and Rotarians instead to do work of service.
sentences.cn: 将服务的工作取而代之的来激励扶轮社和扶轮社员.

sentences.en: Must be able to motivate and inspire a team.
sentences.cn: 必须能够激发和激励团队.

sentences.en: Never let it be said that the manager doesn't know how to motivate his players.
sentences.cn: 绝对不要让人说这位主教练不知道如何激励他的队员。

sentences.en: Official visits are the district governor to motivate and recognize club Rotarians.
sentences.cn: 公式访问则是要由地区总监去鼓舞和表彰扶轮社员们.

sentences.en: Our challenge is to motivate those voters and inspire them to join our cause.
sentences.cn: 我们面临的挑战是如何调动那些选民的积极性并鼓励他们加入我们的事业。

sentences.en: Stock options are a good way to motivate employees to work harder.
sentences.cn: 股票选择权是激励员工更努力工作的好方法.

sentences.en: The only way you can motivate people is to communicate with them.
sentences.cn: 调动别人积极性的唯一方法是与他们交流.

sentences.en: Was he motivated solely by a desire for power?
sentences.cn: 他只是受到权欲的驱使吗？

sentences.en: What have you learned about using deadlines to motivate people or teams?
sentences.cn: 在利用截止日期激励员工或工作团队方面,您得到了什么益处?

sentences.en: You can set better'targets'to motivate better results.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过设定更高的目标来争取更好的结果.
